title: The Astounding Wolf-Man, Volume 1
description: When Gary Hampton is mauled and left for dead, his life takes a drastic turn! Gary is cursed ―when the moon is full he transforms into a beast of the night ― a werewolf! This curse will not be used for evil ― witness the birth of the world's most unlikely new superhero ― The Astounding Wolf-Man!
author: Robert Kirkman
